attributes.action: Save Yasuni National Park from the Oil Companies!
attributes.additional_details:
The signatories to this petition wish to save Yasuni national park. It demands that the UK government support a visionary plan to raise the money required to conserve this pristine ecological paradise from oil companies. We demand that the UK government makes generous and symbolic donations to this plan and lobbies the European Union and other governments around the world to pledge equally generous amounts.

See article from the Guardian for details: http://www.guardian.co.uk/environment/2011/aug/14/ecuador-oil-yasuni-national-park?intcmp=122.
